languages.text: "Ты остался верен своим принципам даже перед лицом смерти. Это заслуживает уважения. Ты прощен и можешь занять место в моей свите".
"Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."
languages.original_text: "Ты остался верен своим принципам даже перед лицом смерти. Это заслуживает уважения. Ты прощен и можешь занять место в моей свите".

traits.locale_text: "Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned and may retake your place in my retinue."
"Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned and may retake your place in my retinue."
"Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."
"Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."
"Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."
"Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."

languages.text: "Ihr bleibt Euren Prinzipien selbst im Angesicht Eures sicheren Todes treu, nicht wahr? Das verdient Respekt. Er seid hiermit begnadigt und dürft Euren Platz in meinem Gefolge wieder einnehmen."
languages.original_text: "Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr bleibt Euren Prinzipien selbst im Angesicht Eures sicheren Todes treu, nicht wahr? Das verdient Respekt. Er seid hiermit begnadigt und dürft Euren Platz in meinem Gefolge wieder einnehmen."

languages.text: « Vous restez fidèle à vos principes, même face à une mort certaine ? C'est là une attitude digne de respect. Je vous pardonne et vous permets de reprendre votre place au sein de mon entourage. »
languages.original_text: "Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."

traits.locale_text: « Vous restez fidèle à vos principes, même face à une mort certaine ? C'est là une attitude digne de respect. Je vous pardonne et vous permets de reprendre votre place au sein de mon entourage. »

languages.text: “即便是必死无疑的情况下，你也要忠于你的原则，是吗？这一点值得尊重。我已经赦免你了，你可以重新做我的随行人员了。”
languages.original_text: "Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."

traits.locale_text: “即便是必死无疑的情况下，你也要忠于你的原则，是吗？这一点值得尊重。我已经赦免你了，你可以重新做我的随行人员了。”

languages.text: «Fiel a sus principios hasta el fin, ¿eh? Eso puedo respetarlo. Queda perdonado y puede retomar su lugar en mi séquito».
languages.original_text: "Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."

traits.locale_text: «Fiel a sus principios hasta el fin, ¿eh? Eso puedo respetarlo. Queda perdonado y puede retomar su lugar en mi séquito».

languages.text: 「死を前にしても、自分の信念に忠実でいられるのか？尊敬に値する。君は赦免され、{mf|俺|私}の従者に復帰していい」
languages.original_text: "Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."

traits.locale_text: 「死を前にしても、自分の信念に忠実でいられるのか？尊敬に値する。君は赦免され、{mf|俺|私}の従者に復帰していい」

languages.text: "Kaçınılmaz ölüm karşısında bile ilkelerine sadıksın demek... Takdire şayan bir davranış. Seni affediyorum. Maiyetimdeki yerine dönebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Loyal to your principles even in the face of certain death, are you? That is something to respect. You are pardoned, and may retake your place in my retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Kaçınılmaz ölüm karşısında bile ilkelerine sadıksın demek? Takdire şayan bir davranış. Seni affediyorum. Maiyetimdeki yerine dönebilirsin."
